snippet.title: Cursed Sight - Trailer
snippet.description:
Being able to control fate would be a blessing for many. To Miyon, it is her greatest curse. East and West Taria are in conflict, and Miyon's power will be the most valuable weapon.

Meanwhile, Gai has been sold by his family into Miyon's temple. Will the two save or destroy one another?

http://cursedsight.invertmouse.com/demo.html 

Running at ~45,000 words, Cursed Sight aims to be my longest visual novel yet. I hope to strike a balance between staying succinct and presenting a length that will satisfy players. 

Cursed Sight is currently on Kickstarter. Please feel free to check out the page and see if anything strikes your fancy: 

http://kck.st/1AnU8PP 

Cursed Sight is also on Steam Greenlight. Your vote would be very much appreciated:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=403682653

Find out more on Cursed Sight's official webpage:

http://cursedsight.invertmouse.com 

Thank you so much everyone!
